data.biography: Academy Award-winning actor known for Titanic, Inception, and The Revenant.
Renowned for his role as Iron Man in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.
One of the greatest actresses of all time, with multiple Academy Awards.
Beloved actor known for Forrest Gump, Cast Away, and Saving Private Ryan.
Famous for roles in Lost in Translation, Lucy, and as Black Widow.
Award-winning actor known for Fight Club, Once Upon a Time in Hollywood, and Troy.
Oscar-winning actress famous for The Hunger Games and Silver Linings Playbook.
Known for The Dark Knight trilogy, American Psycho, and Vice.
Academy Award-winning actress for Black Swan, also known for Star Wars.
Two-time Academy Award winner known for Training Day and Malcolm X.
Legendary actor with a distinctive voice, known for The Shawshank Redemption.
Oscar-winning actress famous for La La Land and The Amazing Spider-Man.
Acclaimed actor known for Joker, Gladiator, and Walk the Line.
Beloved for The Matrix, John Wick, and Bill & Ted’s Excellent Adventure.
Multi-award-winning actress known for Blue Jasmine, Carol, and The Lord of the Rings.
Famous for playing Wolverine in X-Men and starring in The Greatest Showman.
Oscar-winning actress and humanitarian known for Girl, Interrupted and Maleficent.
Known for La La Land, Drive, and The Notebook.
Oscar winner known for Les Misérables, The Devil Wears Prada, and Interstellar.
Acclaimed for his roles in Donnie Darko, Nightcrawler, and Brokeback Mountain.
